title: Registration Spring 2025
desc:
I'm happy to share the list of courses that I registered for Spring 2025. In the field of physics, I'm registered for PHYS 2212 Principles of Physics II and PHYS 2213 Introduction to Modern Physics. I'm also unofficially sitting in PHYS 4262 Solid State Physics and PHYS 4143 Quantum Mechanics II for enrichment. For other sciences and engineering courses, I'm in CHEM 1310 Principle of General Chemistry for Engineers, COE 2001 Statics, ME 2016 Computing Techniques, and ECE 3710 Circuits and Electronics. In the field of music, I'm enrolled in MUSI 2011 Fundamentals of Musicianship. I'm also in APPH 1040 to complete the institution health requirement.

#registration #courses

desc: In Spring 25, besides regular courses that I officially registered for, I am unofficially sitting in PHYS 4143 Quantum Mechanics II and PHYS 4262 Solid State Physics, achieving a moderate conceptual understanding in both. #courses
